(js ^27th August, 1958CABINETOPERATIONS IN THE MIDDLE east note by the Secretary of the CabinetThe issue of daily situation reports (C.(5S) 15")will be discontinued after 29-h August.(Signed) NORMAN brook cabinet Office, S.W.I.27th August, 1958
